content.raw:
I am installing drcsim 2.5 in a 64-bit Ubuntu machine (12.10) with Ros Groovy. I get the following error:

/home/ana/Software/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64/libAtlasSimInterface.so: error: undefined reference to 'QuadProgPP::solve_quadprog_chol_lukewarmstart(bool, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, int, int, double, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const*, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const*, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const*, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const*)'
/home/ana/Software/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64/libAtlasSimInterface.so: error: undefined reference to 'QuadProgPP::solve_quadprog(QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&)'
/home/ana/Software/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64/libAtlasSimInterface.so: error: undefined reference to 'QuadProgPP::solve_quadprog_chol_init(bool, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, int&, int&, double&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>*, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>*, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>*, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>*)'
 

I got some other errors that were fixed by adding rt, qpOASES and z to the target_link_libraries, but the error related QuadProgPP persists. Any advice would be highly appreciated.
content.html:
I am installing drcsim 2.5 in a 64-bit Ubuntu machine (12.10) with Ros Groovy. I get the following error:

/home/ana/Software/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64/libAtlasSimInterface.so: error: undefined reference to 'QuadProgPP::solve_quadprog_chol_lukewarmstart(bool, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, int, int, double, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const)' /home/ana/Software/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64/libAtlasSimInterface.so: error: undefined reference to 'QuadProgPP::solve_quadprog(QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&)' /home/ana/Software/drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64/libAtlasSimInterface.so: error: undefined reference to 'QuadProgPP::solve_quadprog_chol_init(bool, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double> const&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, int&, int&, double&, QuadProgPP::Matrix<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>&, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>, QuadProgPP::Vector<double>)'

I got some other errors that were fixed by adding rt, qpOASES and z to the target_link_libraries, but the error related QuadProgPP persists. Any advice would be highly appreciated.
